img.h1: Windber Area School District COVID-19 Resources and Toolkit

p.strong: This site and pages to the right will be updated throughout the coming weeks with more information from the Windber Area School District. Please look through the pages on the right hand side of this page for latest updates:

span.strong: If you need to call the school during the mandated closure please dial (814) 467-4567 extension 801 please leave a message and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

p.strong: The Department of Education (PDE) announced on Thursday, April 9th that all schools in the Commonwealth will remain closed the remainder of the 2019-20 school year.

strong.span: We know that there are many questions as to what the rest of our school year may look like. Rest assured our administrative team is working diligently to get these answers and that your child’s safety, welfare, and education is our top priority.
Government officials and the Department of Education are working on "the Emergency School Code Act" in which school districts may deliver instruction.

We will await guidance and timelines from the Intermediate Unit 8 as directed by the Secretary of Education. We will pass relevant information along to you as soon as it becomes available and factual.

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 5pt; line-height: normal; background: white; padding: 0px

p.strong: For all COVID-19 Updates please check CDC's website: CDC Website Click Here
BAGGED LUNCHES FOR ALL CHILDREN 18 AND UNDER ARE AVAILABLE

span.strong: AT THE FOLLOWING LOCATIONS ON MONDAYS & THURSDAYS

p.strong: FROM 11:15 a.m. to 12:30 p.m. DURING SCHOOL CLOSURE

strong.span: IF ADDITIONAL MEALS ARE NEEDED FOR MEMBERS OF YOUR FAMILY PLEASE SPEAK TO

p.strong: That information will be posted to our District Facebook page as well as our District website. Please continue to follow the advice from the Centers for Disease Control as well as from the PA Department of Health concerning hand-washing and other preventive measures.

div.span: Video Messages from our Administrative Team & Teachers

span.span: Please click on the links below to watch video messages from our administrators updating you on the the school closure and our Continuity of Education plan.

br.span: You can also watch the video messages from our teachers to our students. Our Teachers have inspirational messages for our students. We are all in this together and we can't wait to see you all again! Stay strong, stay positive, stay healthy, and let's show everyone what Ramblers are made of! We love and miss you all!
